data.lyric:
[ti:Same Boat]
[ar:Zac Brown Band]
[al:Same Boat]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.51]Same Boat - Zac Brown Band
[00:01.64]Lyrics by：Zac Brown/Ben Simonetti/Jonathan Singleton
[00:03.06]
[00:06.37]We're all in the same boat
[00:08.32]
[00:09.19]Fishin' in the same hole
[00:11.65]Wonderin' where the same time goes
[00:13.93]
[00:14.48]We're all in the same boat
[00:16.73]
[00:18.20]We could all believe what we believe
[00:21.77]
[00:23.98]Peacefully agree to disagree
[00:27.10]
[00:29.54]But you can't judge a man
[00:31.73]Until you walk a country mile in his shoes
[00:35.75]
[00:36.90]Dood'n-doo-doo-doo
[00:38.37]
[00:39.80]We're all in the same boat
[00:42.01]
[00:42.67]Fishin' in the same hole
[00:45.28]Wonderin' where the same time goes and money too
[00:49.41]
[00:50.78]Tryin' to fix the same broke hearts
[00:53.11]
[00:53.80]Wishin' on the same stars
[00:56.54]We're all hopin' hope floats
[00:58.67]
[00:59.19]We're all in the same boat
[01:01.31]
[01:02.24]We all been kicked and knocked around
[01:06.37]
[01:08.42]But you ain't gonna keep a good man down
[01:11.89]
[01:14.25]You can run like hell from your mistakes
[01:17.45]But you can't hide from your truth
[01:20.09]
[01:21.61]Rood'n-doo-doo-doo
[01:22.95]
[01:24.48]We're all in the same boat
[01:26.51]
[01:27.39]Fishin' in the same hole
[01:29.93]Wonderin' where the same time goes and money too
[01:33.79]
[01:35.46]Tryin' to fix the same broke hearts
[01:37.78]
[01:38.51]Wishin' on the same stars
[01:41.15]We're all hopin' hope floats
[01:43.29]
[01:43.96]We're all in the same boat
[01:45.99]
[02:09.95]Share them peaches if you're holdin'
[02:12.74]Take those shots and keep reloadin'
[02:15.47]If you can't be nice don't say nothin' at all
[02:18.97]
[02:20.81]So help somebody who might be strugglin'
[02:23.86]Spread a little love gotta give back somethin'
[02:26.45]If this ship keeps rockin' we'll all go overboard
[02:32.93]We're all in the same boat
[02:34.81]
[02:35.63]Fishin' in the same hole
[02:37.89]
[02:38.44]Wonderin' where the same time goes and money too
[02:42.22]
[02:44.04]Tryin' to fix the same broke hearts
[02:46.01]
[02:46.96]Wishin' on the same stars
[02:49.57]We're all hopin' hope floats
[02:51.68]
[02:52.26]We're all in the same boat
[02:54.29]
[02:55.08]Yeah we're all hopin' hope floats
[02:57.26]
[02:57.91]We're all in the same boat
